SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package org.example.floweektracker.planner

Class WeekDayPanelUI

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.planner.WeekDayPanelUI
public class WeekDayPanelUI extends Object
Represents UI of the schedule for one of the weekdays, displaying the name of the weekday, its schedule and a return button to the user.

Fields:
  • weekDay - a WeekDays enum representing the name of a specified weekdays
  • weekDayScrollPane - a JScrollPane contains a weekday panel created by createWeekDayPanel() providing a scrollable view for the user
  • tasks - a HashMap contains all tasks from one of the weekdays
  • mainCards - a JPanel with a CardLayout contains panels to be displayed to the user
  • main - a Main reference containing the passed instance of the main application class
Methods:
  • createWeekDayPanel() - creates a JPanel representing the UI schedule for the specified weekday, which is displayed to the user
Auxiliary methods:
  • createHeadlinePanel() - creates a JPanel containing the headline for the panel created by the createWeekDayPanel() method
  • createContentPanel() - creates a JPanel containing tasks panels for the panel created by the createWeekDayPanel() method
  • createTaskPanel(SingleTaskManager) - creates a JPanel representing the UI for a SingleTaskManager task
  • createBottomPanel() - creates a JPanel containing a JButton representing a return button
  • createGrid(int, int, String, int, Insets) - creates a GridBagConstraints used in the createTaskPanel(SingleTaskManager) method
Getters: weekDayScrollPane

  • Constructor Details

    • WeekDayPanelUI

      public WeekDayPanelUI(int weekDayNum, HashMap<String,SingleTaskManager> tasks, JPanel mainCards, Main main)
      Constructs a new WeekDayPanelUI instance with the specified weekDayNum, tasks, mainCards, and main. This constructor initializes references to the weekDay, tasks, mainCards, and main fields based on the provided parameters. It also creates a weekDayScrollPane, sets its name and configures its vertical scroll bar policy.
      Parameters:
      weekDayNum - a number representing the weekday to initialize the WeekDays enum
      tasks - a HashMap used to initialize the tasks mapping
      mainCards - a JPanel used to initialize the mainCards container
      main - a Main instance used to initialize the main application context
      See Also:
      • MainListeners.createPlannerListener()

  • Method Details

    • getWeekDayScrollPane

      public JScrollPane getWeekDayScrollPane()
      Returns:
      a weekDayScrollPane instance, which provides scrollable functionality for the weekday schedule panel
      See Also:
      • MainListeners.createPlannerListener()
